title.rendered: Brisbane vs Sydney, Australian T20 League, 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Probable XI for Brisbane: Max Bryant, Colin Munro, Sam Billings, Jimmy Peirson (c & wk), Ross Whiteley, Michael Neser, James Bazley, Xavier Bartlett, Mark Steketee, Matthew Kuhnemann, Mitchell Swepson

Probable XI for Sydney: Kurtis Patterson, Josh Philippe (wk), James Vince, Moises Henriques (c), Jordan Silk, Daniel Christian, Hayden Kerr, Naveen-ul-haq, Ben Dwarshuis, Jackson Bird/Sean Abbott, Izharulhaq Naveed

Venue: The Gabba, Brisbane

Pitch Report

(Based on the last 2 games)

1st innings average score: 173

2nd innings average score: 160

Type: Even contest between bat and ball.

Wickets per innings: 7

Weather: Cloudy. No threat of rain.

Wins

Batting1st: 100%

Batting2nd: —

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Seamers from both sides have been amongst the wickets regularly, owing to which they have become the hot picks in fantasy leagues.

While Sydney’s lower order appears a bit weak, Brisbane have plenty of firepower towards the end of the innings.

Interestingly, wicketkeepers from both sides have also been helping fantasy players stay ahead in the race.
